featured.text: There were many sayings about their desire for alcohol, such as “drunk as a German.”
Which of the following sayings best captures the spirit of Jeanie Low’s story? (A) Failure is the mother of success.
In Switzerland, there is a saying that every good Swiss citizen has one in his or her pocket.

definition.en_def: A phrase or expression that conveys a particular idea or sentiment.
definition.example: She has a saying that helps her stay positive during tough times.
